title: Minimum win requirement to play ranked
body: starting to get really sick of getting game after game of players who are obviously too new to the game to be playing ranked (first time champs, no masteries and just horrible picks etc) who make trying to climb out of low elo near impossible. Does anyone else think there should be a minimum ammount of wins (or atleast games played) with champions BEFORE you are allowed play them in a ranked game? or an overall ammount of wins perhaps. Thoughts?

replies.body: Thing is normal doesn't really prepare you for ranked.

I am smurfing (if you call it smurfing ... since I was inactive a very long time) . So I started on a new account again.
It wouldnt be fair if I have to grind tons of normals for that because I am an advanced player
tbh that should technically make it easier for you to climb as there is more chance that those players will be on the opponents team not yours as you have 4 team mate vs 5 opponents...
